metadata.description: Unified data structure for Aarogya Global medical tourism platform

cardiology.name: Cardiology
cardiology.description: Expert heart and cardiovascular care services

overview.description: Cardiology is a medical specialty that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of conditions affecting the heart and cardiovascular system. Our medical tourism platform connects patients with the best cardiology hospitals and doctors worldwide, offering advanced diagnostic tools, cutting-edge treatment options, and cost-effective healthcare solutions.

treatments.name: Coronary Angioplasty
treatments.description: Minimally invasive procedure to open blocked coronary arteries

treatments.name: Heart Bypass Surgery
treatments.description: Surgical procedure to create new routes around blocked arteries

treatments.name: Pacemaker Implantation
treatments.description: Device implantation to regulate heart rhythm

overview.description: Gynaecology is a medical specialty that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of conditions affecting the female reproductive system. Our medical tourism platform connects patients with the best gynecology hospitals and doctors worldwide, offering advanced diagnostic tools, cutting-edge treatment options, and cost-effective healthcare solutions.

treatments.name: IVF Treatment
treatments.description: In vitro fertilization for couples facing fertility challenges

treatments.name: Laparoscopy
treatments.description: Minimally invasive surgery for gynecological conditions

treatments.name: Hysterectomy
treatments.description: Surgical removal of uterus for various medical conditions

neurology.name: Neurology
neurology.description: Advanced brain and nervous system treatments

overview.description: Neurology is a medical specialty that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of conditions affecting the brain, spinal cord, and nervous system. Our medical tourism platform connects patients with the best neurology hospitals and doctors worldwide, offering advanced diagnostic tools, cutting-edge treatment options, and cost-effective healthcare solutions.

treatments.name: Deep Brain Stimulation
treatments.description: Surgical procedure to implant electrodes in the brain for movement disorders

treatments.name: Brain Tumor Surgery
treatments.description: Surgical removal of brain tumors using advanced techniques

overview.description: Oncology is a medical specialty that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of cancer. Our medical tourism platform connects patients with the best oncology hospitals and doctors worldwide, offering advanced diagnostic tools, cutting-edge treatment options, and cost-effective healthcare solutions.

treatments.name: Chemotherapy
treatments.description: Drug treatment to destroy cancer cells throughout the body

treatments.name: Radiation Therapy
treatments.description: High-energy radiation to destroy cancer cells in specific areas

treatments.name: Immunotherapy
treatments.description: Treatment that uses the body's immune system to fight cancer

orthopaedics.name: Orthopaedics
orthopaedics.description: Specialized care for bones, joints, muscles, and skeletal system

overview.description: Orthopaedics is a medical specialty that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of conditions affecting the musculoskeletal system including bones, joints, muscles, ligaments, and tendons. Our medical tourism platform connects patients with the best orthopedic hospitals and doctors worldwide, offering advanced diagnostic tools, cutting-edge treatment options, and cost-effective healthcare solutions.
highlights: Top-rated orthopedic surgeons with international experience

treatments.name: Knee Replacement
treatments.description: Surgical replacement of damaged knee joint with artificial implant

treatments.name: Hip Replacement
treatments.description: Surgical replacement of damaged hip joint with artificial implant

treatments.name: ACL Reconstruction
treatments.description: Surgical reconstruction of torn anterior cruciate ligament

urology.name: Urology
urology.description: Expert urological care for kidney, bladder, and reproductive system conditions

overview.description: Urology is a medical specialty that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of conditions affecting the urinary tract and male reproductive system. Our medical tourism platform connects patients with the best urology hospitals and doctors worldwide, offering advanced diagnostic tools, cutting-edge treatment options, and cost-effective healthcare solutions.

Dr. Inderbir S. Gill
doctors.education: All India Institute of Medical Sciences

treatments.name: Robotic RP for Prostate Cancer
treatments.description: Robotic-assisted radical prostatectomy using advanced Da Vinci system

treatments.name: Liver transplant for treatment of cancer
treatments.description: Complete liver transplant procedure for cancer treatment

treatments.name: Kidney transplant
treatments.description: Kidney transplant with living or deceased donor

globalHospitals.name: Apollo Hospital Chennai
globalHospitals.about: Apollo Hospital Chennai is a premier healthcare institution known for its excellence in cardiac care and comprehensive medical services. With state-of-the-art facilities and a team of experienced specialists, we provide world-class healthcare to our patients.

reviews.comment: Excellent cardiac care. The doctors are very professional and caring.
World-class facilities and amazing staff. Highly recommended.

globalHospitals.name: Fortis Hospital Delhi
globalHospitals.about: Fortis Hospital Delhi is a leading healthcare facility specializing in cardiac care and pediatric cardiology. Our commitment to excellence and patient-centric approach makes us a trusted name in healthcare.

reviews.comment: Best hospital for cardiac care. Doctors are very experienced.
Good facilities and caring staff. Would recommend.

globalHospitals.name: Ruby Hall Clinic
globalHospitals.about: Ruby Hall Clinic is a renowned healthcare institution with a rich legacy of providing quality healthcare services. Our cardiac surgery unit is one of the best in the region.

reviews.comment: Excellent cardiac surgery team. Very professional and caring.
Good hospital with experienced doctors. Satisfied with treatment.

globalHospitals.name: Kokilaben Hospital
globalHospitals.address: Rao Saheb Achutrao Patwardhan Marg, Four Bungalows, Andheri (W), Mumbai - 400058
globalHospitals.about: Kokilaben Hospital is a state-of-the-art healthcare facility known for its excellence in neurology and comprehensive medical care. Our stroke unit is one of the most advanced in the country.

reviews.comment: Best neurology department. Doctors are very knowledgeable.
Excellent stroke care. Very satisfied with the treatment.

globalHospitals.name: Manipal Hospital
globalHospitals.about: Manipal Hospital Bangalore is a premier healthcare institution known for its excellence in orthopedic care and joint replacement surgeries. Our state-of-the-art facilities ensure the best patient outcomes.

reviews.comment: Best orthopedic care. Joint replacement surgery was successful.
Excellent facilities and caring staff. Highly recommended.

globalDoctors.name: Dr. Suresh Reddy
globalDoctors.about: Dr. Suresh Reddy is a highly experienced interventional cardiologist with over 20 years of expertise in treating complex cardiac conditions. He has performed more than 5000 successful angioplasty procedures and is known for his precision and patient care.

globalDoctors.name: Dr. Meera Joshi
globalDoctors.about: Dr. Meera Joshi is a renowned cardiac surgeon specializing in complex heart surgeries. With over 16 years of experience, she has successfully performed more than 2000 cardiac surgeries and is known for her innovative surgical techniques.

globalDoctors.name: Dr. Vikram Singh
globalDoctors.about: Dr. Vikram Singh is a dedicated pediatric cardiologist with expertise in treating congenital heart diseases in children. He has helped thousands of children with heart conditions and is known for his gentle approach with young patients.

globalDoctors.name: Dr. Priya Sharma
globalDoctors.about: Dr. Priya Sharma is a leading neurologist with extensive experience in treating complex neurological disorders. She specializes in stroke treatment and has been instrumental in establishing stroke units across multiple hospitals.

globalDoctors.name: Dr. Rajesh Kumar
globalDoctors.about: Dr. Rajesh Kumar is a highly skilled orthopedic surgeon with expertise in joint replacement and arthroscopic surgeries. He has performed over 3000 successful joint replacement surgeries and is known for his precision and patient outcomes.

education.institution: Hospital for Special Surgery, New York
